parameters.functionScript:
Noodl.Object.create({
    id: 'Consts',
    taskDurations: [
        { value: 60, label: dayjs.duration(60, 'm').locale("ru").humanize() },
        { value: 120, label: dayjs.duration(120, 'm').locale("ru").humanize() },
        { value: 180, label: dayjs.duration(180, 'm').locale("ru").humanize() },
        { value: 240, label: dayjs.duration(240, 'm').locale("ru").humanize() },
        { value: 300, label: dayjs.duration(300, 'm').locale("ru").humanize() },
        { value: 360, label: dayjs.duration(360, 'm').locale("ru").humanize() },
    ],
    taskStateColorMap: {
        planned: 'orange',
        active: 'blue',
        success: 'green',
        failed: 'red'
    }
})

const items = Inputs.items
const foundedItems = Inputs.foundedItems?.result
const searchEnabled = Inputs.searchString?.length > 0

let resultItems = []
if (searchEnabled) {
    resultItems = foundedItems || []
} else resultItems = items
Outputs.items = resultItems
Inputs.formHook?.setValues({complex: Inputs.createdItem?.id})

const item = Inputs.item
if (item) {
    Outputs.complexName = item.complex.content.name
    Outputs.houseAdress = item.content.address
    Outputs.areaCount = item.agData.counts.area
    Outputs.areas = item.area
}

parameters.functionScript:
const data = {
    task: Inputs.task,
    complex: Inputs.complex,
    house: Inputs.house,
    area: Inputs.area,
    worker: Inputs.worker
}
if (
    data.task
    && data.complex
    && data.house
    && data.area
    && data.worker
) Outputs.data = data

parameters.code:
const cap = s => s && s[0].toUpperCase() + s.slice(1)
let startDate = dayjs().startOf('month'), endDate = {}, dateString = ''

Script.Signals.Init = () => {
    const dateRangeSelector = Script.Inputs.dateRangeSelector || 'date'
    switch (dateRangeSelector) {
        case 'date':
            startDate = dayjs().startOf('month')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('month')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('MMMM YYYY'))
            break
        default:
            startDate = startDate.startOf('year')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('year')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('YYYY'))
    }
    Script.Outputs.startDate = startDate
    Script.Outputs.endDate = endDate
    Script.Outputs.dateString = dateString
}

Script.Signals.Prev = () => {
    const dateRangeSelector = Script.Inputs.dateRangeSelector || 'date'
    switch (dateRangeSelector) {
        case 'date':
            startDate = startDate.add(-1, 'month')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('month')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('MMMM'))
            break
        default:
            startDate = startDate.startOf('year')
            startDate = startDate.add(-1, 'year')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('year')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('YYYY'))
    }
    Script.Outputs.startDate = startDate
    Script.Outputs.endDate = endDate
    Script.Outputs.dateString = dateString
}
Script.Signals.Next = () => {
    const dateRangeSelector = Script.Inputs.dateRangeSelector || 'date'
    switch (dateRangeSelector) {
        case 'date':
            startDate = startDate.add(1, 'month')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('month')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('MMMM YYYY'))
            break
        default:
            startDate = startDate.startOf('year')
            startDate = startDate.add(1, 'year')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('year')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('YYYY'))
    }
    Script.Outputs.startDate = startDate
    Script.Outputs.endDate = endDate
    Script.Outputs.dateString = dateString
}

parameters.functionScript:
const item = Inputs.item
const durations = Inputs.durations
if (item) {
    Outputs.taskName = item.content.name
    Outputs.complexName = item.complex.content.name
    Outputs.houseName = item.house.content.name
    Outputs.areaName = item.area.content.name
    Outputs.startDatePlan = dayjs(item.content.schedule.startDate.plan).format('YYYY-MM-DD')
    Outputs.startTimePlan = dayjs(item.content.schedule.startDate.plan).format('HH:mm')
    Outputs.duration = durations.find(d => d.value === item.content.schedule.duration.plan).label
    Outputs.openTime = durations.find(d => d.value === item.content.schedule.openTime).label
    Outputs.liveTime = durations.find(d => d.value === item.content.schedule.liveTime).label
    Outputs.scheduleType = item.content.schedule.type
    Outputs.weekdaysMounted = item.content.schedule.type === 'multiple'
    Outputs.weekdays = item.content.schedule.weekdays
    Outputs.workerObj = [item.worker]
    Outputs.workerId = item.worker.id    
}

parameters.functionScript:
const taskId = Inputs.taskId
const content = Inputs.content
const state = Inputs.states?.flow

Outputs.taskName = mustache.render('{{content.name}}', Noodl.Objects[taskId])
Outputs.taskState = mustache.render('{{states.flow.title}}', Noodl.Objects[taskId])
Outputs.taskStateColor = Noodl.Objects.Consts.taskStateColorMap[state.value]
Outputs.startDate = dayjs(content.schedule.startDate.plan).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm')
Outputs.durationPlan = dayjs.duration(content.schedule.duration.plan, 'm')
  .locale("ru").humanize()

const complexId = Inputs.complex?.id
Outputs.complexName = mustache.render('{{content.name}}', Noodl.Objects[complexId])

const houseId = Inputs.house?.id
Outputs.houseName = mustache.render('{{content.name}}', Noodl.Objects[houseId])

const taskId = Inputs.taskId
const task = Noodl.Objects[Inputs.taskId]
const content = Inputs.content
const state = Inputs.states?.flow

Outputs.taskName = mustache.render('{{content.name}}', task)
Outputs.activateMounted = task.states.flow.value === 'planned'
Outputs.finishMounted = task.states.flow.value === 'active'
Outputs.resultIds = task.result.map(r => r.id)
Outputs.taskStateValue = task.states.flow.value

parameters.value: Выберите зону уборки, после чего подтвердите начало уборки.

dynamicports.name: inputMappingScript

parameters.functionScript:
const resultId = Inputs.resultId

Outputs.resultName = mustache.render('{{content.name}}', Noodl.Objects[resultId])
Outputs.resultDescription = mustache.render('{{content.description}}', Noodl.Objects[resultId])

const taskId = Inputs.taskId
const content = Inputs.content
const state = Inputs.states?.flow

Outputs.taskName = mustache.render('{{content.name}}', Noodl.Objects[taskId])
Outputs.taskState = mustache.render('{{states.flow.title}}', Noodl.Objects[taskId])
Outputs.taskStateValue = mustache.render('{{states.flow.value}}', Noodl.Objects[taskId])
Outputs.taskStateColor = Noodl.Objects.Consts.taskStateColorMap[state.value]
Outputs.startDatePlan = dayjs(content.schedule.startDate.plan).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm')
Outputs.startDateFact = dayjs(content.schedule.startDate.fact).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm')
Outputs.durationPlan = dayjs.duration(content.schedule.duration.plan, 'm')
  .locale("ru").humanize()
const durationFact = content.schedule.duration.fact
console.log(durationFact)
const startDateFactHours = dayjs.duration(durationFact, 'm').locale("ru").humanize()
const startDateFactMinutes = dayjs.duration(Math.floor(durationFact / 60), 'm')
  .locale("ru").humanize()
Outputs.durationFact = startDateFactHours + ' ' + startDateFactMinutes

const complexId = Inputs.complex?.id
Outputs.complexName = mustache.render('{{content.name}}', Noodl.Objects[complexId])

const houseId = Inputs.house?.id
Outputs.houseName = mustache.render('{{content.name}}', Noodl.Objects[houseId])

const taskId = Inputs.taskId
Outputs.taskName = mustache.render('{{content.name}}', Noodl.Objects[taskId])
